name: vuex-orm
description: The Vuex plugin to enable Object-Relational Mapping access to the Vuex Store.

scripts.test: npm run build -- --target es2015 && ava lib/**/__test__/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run build -- --target es2015 && npm run dev & ava lib/**/__test__/**/*.spec.js --watch
scripts.coverage: npm run build -- --target es2015 && nyc ava lib/**/__test__/**/*.spec.js && nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && rm -rf lib/__test__ && rm -rf rm -rf lib/**/__test__

author: Kia Ishii
